short_summary: Government cellular services and products within Canada and internationally.
description: Procurement of cellular services and products within Canada and internationally.
full_summary:
### Government Cellular Services (GCS) Tender Announcement

#### Tender Details

*   **Title:** Government Cellular Services (GCS)
*   **Reference Number:** SSC-24-00027762:T
*   **Solicitation Number:** BPM022250/27762
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-10-01
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-10-30T14:00:00
*   **Tender Status:** Expired
*   **Gisin:** D399B: Telecommunications - Voice Service
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

#### Tender Description

Shared Services Canada seeks to procure cellular services and products within Canada, as well as services when roaming in the United States and internationally. The contract period for any resulting Government Cellular Services contracts is intended to be 6 years, with 4 option periods of 1 year each. This Invitation to Qualify is intended to pre-qualify suppliers that possess the qualifications required by SSC for participation in the next phase of the procurement process. No contract will result from this Invitation to Qualify.

#### Contracting Entity

*   **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   **Name:** Rebecca Lustig
    *   **Phone:** 613-290-8063
    *   **Email:** None
    *   **Address:**
        *   99 Metcalf Street
        *   Ottawa, Ontario
        *   K2P 2N1
        *   Canada

#### Submission Requirements

Suppliers must be registered on the Procure to Pay (P2P) portal and logged in to submit a response. Suppliers can register for an account by visiting https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca and clicking “New Supplier? / Register Now.”

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT), Canada-U
